item.title: Impressum
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)

item.title: Portfolio
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)

item.title: Low-Code Platform – Boosting Efficiency for Developers and Citizen Developers Alike
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: By implementing a future-proof Low-Code platform, both professional developers and Citizen Developers were empowered to efficiently build applications. The platform resulted in a remarkable 80% efficiency increase and saved approximately €4.2 million in the first year.

item.title: Makerspace
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: Building Innovation: The Creation of a Makerspace and Its Impact on Technological Advancement

item.title: Simracing Wheel
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: Building a sim racing wheel is a complex integration of design, high-quality materials, ergonomics, and precise electronics, resulting in a custom, exceptional driving experience, made possible by the expertise gained in Fusion 360.

item.title: Planning and Execution of a Hackathon for Talent Acquisition
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: By successfully planning and executing a hackathon for over 120 participants aimed at talent acquisition, innovative solutions were developed for company challenges, and team spirit was significantly strengthened.

item.title: Leading a Hackathon Challenge to Develop Affordable Robotic Arms
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: By leading a hackathon challenge focused on building three cost-efficient robotic arms, we successfully developed a functional system as an innovative and affordable alternative to expensive industrial solutions.

item.title: Optimized IoT Monitoring with LoRaWAN – Facility Management Innovation
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: The implementation of the LoRaWAN standard for monitoring critical environmental variables at various locations has significantly increased efficiency, minimized maintenance efforts, and created a future-proof system for IoT applications.

item.title: Rebuild a Motorcycle (spare time)
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: Motorcycle Rebuild: Crafting a Customized Ride

item.title: Streamlining Inventory Management
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: Streamlining Inventory Management: A Case Study in Efficiency Enhancement

item.title: 3D Printer from scratch (spare time)
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: I built a 3D printer from scratch, leveraging my deep understanding of 3D printing processes to design a custom device with precise software and mechanical integration.

item.title: Optimizing Foot Traffic Flow
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: Enhancing Efficiency with Pax Counters: Optimizing Foot Traffic Flow

item.title: Parking Management with Machine Vision
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: Revolutionizing Parking Management with Machine Vision Technology

item.title: Optimized IT Infrastructure with Proactive Monitoring and Efficiency Improvements
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: Through strategic planning, continual optimization, and the implementation of an effective monitoring system, the department’s IT infrastructure was successfully scaled, optimized, and prepared for future growth demands.

item.title: Development of an Innovative Meeting Room Booking System with 3D Visualization
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: The development of an intelligent and interactive meeting room booking system with 3D visualization and hardware integration transformed the management and booking process for meeting rooms.

item.title: Smart Workspace Solution
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: Desk Sensor: Leading the Development of a Smart Workspace Solution

item.title: Implementation of a Shopfloor Visualization System for Real-Time Machine Data
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: By implementing a Shopfloor visualization system to display machine data in real-time, we established the foundations for more efficient process control and optimization in production.

item.title: Developing an Interface for an Undocumented Manufacturing Machine through Network Analysis
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: By conducting network analysis and detailed traffic inspection, I successfully decoded the communication protocol of an undocumented manufacturing machine and integrated it into the digital infrastructure.

item.title: Implementation of a Complex Reference System for the Integration of Non-Standardized Manufacturing Systems and Sensor Data
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: Through the development and implementation of a complex reference system, non-standardized manufacturing systems and external sensors were efficiently integrated into the company’s datalake. This enabled precise analyses, the development of machine learning models, and the optimization of manufacturing processes.

item.title: Evaluation of Remote Maintenance Systems for Cargo Ships under Limited Network Conditions
item.author: business@stigler.de (Patrick Stigler)
item.description: The evaluation of CAP and XMReality identified remote maintenance solutions that connect less technically skilled personnel with remote experts globally. The solutions were tested specifically for their efficiency under slow and unstable internet connections on ships.
